parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mission Information

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Check if saving the game is enabled.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>If saving is disabled by [[Eden Editor]] mission attribute, this command will still return [[true]].</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''savingEnabled'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[savingEnabled]]) [[then]] {
  [[hint]] "Saving is enabled!";
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[enableSaving]], [[loadGame]], [[saveGame]]
</value></part></template>
